document_data.name: Aello
document_data.mainbody:
'''Lucky Aello''' was a rather unscrupulous shopkeeper and the proprietor of [[Lucky Aello's Discount Store]] in [[Baldur's Gate]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Hi, folks, welcome to Lucky Aello's, where the prices are so low there's gotta be something wrong. Nobody sells it lower than me, because nobody buys it cheaper. If you can find a price lower than mine this side of [[Calimshan]], the item will probably kill you.|Lucky Aello's pitch to his customers.}}
document_data.Activities: Aello sold a number of [[curse]]d items from his shop, found on the eastern side of the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]]. He primarily dealt in [[scroll]]s and [[potion]]s, but also managed to get his hands on some, less-than-useful [[magic]]al [[weapon]]s.
